meta_comment: RETURN ONLY THIS JSON. NO MARKDOWN. NO CHATTER.
manager_feedback: A direct, brutal 1-sentence feedback from the Hiring Manager in ITALIAN (e.g., 'Troppo generico, voglio vedere codice specifico').
